text: _â€” @ Answer - C 68 Explanation: @ A handle is actually the one which is always on the top of the stack. A viable prefix(prefix of the Right-hand side of a production or productions), is actually a prefix of the handle and so can never extend past the right end of the Q/ handle(i.e. the top of the stack). Best . answer The structure of the stack can be considered as a set of viable prefixes - Stack = {PrefiziPrefizsPrefixs ... Prefiz, 1 Prefiz,} and soitis not wrong to say that the stack contains a set of viable prefixes.
